name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PandaDoc Proposals and eSignatures for Copper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create, send, track, and eSign proposals and quotes from within Copper CRM to expedite your sales process and close deals fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access the PandaDoc panel from any opportunity, contact or company record within Copper. In minutes you can easily create, send, and track documents on-the-fly. 

- Create dynamic sales docs in minutes right within Copper CRM opportunities, contacts, and companies objects.

- Save time and money with legally-binding built-in eSignatures. No need to purchase a separate electronic signature tool. 

- Get immediate access to your documents in any object as they are automatically stored in PandaDoc. 

- Merge data from Copper into your documents automatically to eliminate errors.

- Track doc statuses in real-time right from Copper without switching between applications.

- Get instant comments from your colleagues and customers to negotiate faster.

Try it free at www.pandadoc.com
